channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree fell down Jan 2024, not replaced, 22nd September
item.description:
Hi, the tree outside 52 Whitmore road, BR3 3NS fell down during a storm in January 2024. I wrote to the council after the storm and was told it was due to be replanted in the next round of tree planting. This hasnâ€™t happened and now there are weeds growing and a slab has been dumped on top of the stump. Please can if prioritised for clearing up and replanting? Thanks, Sarah

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitmore Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass needs cutting, 22nd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Lane, Petts Wood, London

item.title: Reauire red lines for NO Stopping near pedestrian crossing, 22nd September
item.description:
Please can we have RED double lines outside El Molinos & Loki cafe on Beckenham road - pedestrians cannot see oncomung traffic when crossing to crossing island when cars & vans are parked outside parade of shops. Pedestrians have to step into road to look aroubd parked vegicles, then jump out if the way to oncoming traffic.. have seen countless near misses and experienced myself... red lines to right of crossing with back to shops is all that is needed... vehicles can park to the other side of Br3wery bar.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 253, Beckenham Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
